name: Ruins of Morhot
description:
Made for the Weekly Game Jam 144: "In The Dark" #WeeklyGameJam #WGJGame

Explore the ruin, solve puzzles and find your way through mazes.

Music: https://opengameart.org/users/tinyworlds

Edit: added a browser version after the jam.

Controls: WASD to move, Spacebar to use echolocation, RMB show/hide camera, LMB take photo, Q/E zoom in/out, R to interact.
